name: Operation Snow Field
description:
A battle royale with mechs at a city filled with snow. This is a sci-fi theme map. Use snow as cover or buildings if you need to. Theres sprint and health regenerating that I added to the game. This project was designed for game jam for the theme twist and I am representing Team Lana Lux.

If you want to play its on core:

https://www.coregames.com/games/51dc42/operation-snow-field
